rooms.name: Entrance Hall
rooms.description: Serves as the main entry with elegant Art Deco detailing and a glass facade to maximize natural light.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Large, open space featuring bold geometric patterns and streamlined furniture typical of Art Deco style. Features a view of the central courtyard.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room with Art Deco decor, including metallic accents and symmetry in design.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen designed with efficient space planning. Incorporates Vastu principles by aligning the stove on the east wall.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 1
rooms.description: Cozy guest room featuring Art Deco detailing and a small balcony to overlook the garden area.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom 2
rooms.description: Additional guest bedroom with modern amenities and decor that complements the overall style.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master suite with an attached bathroom, en-suite closet, and a private balcony. Adheres to Vastu by positioning the bed in the southwest corner for better energy flow.

rooms.name: Master Bathroom
rooms.description: En-suite master bathroom designed with Art Deco fixtures and efficient water management as per local building norms.

rooms.name: Family Room
rooms.description: Versatile space used for family gatherings, incorporating Vastu by ensuring proper ventilation and lighting.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Dedicated library space with built-in shelves and a comfortable reading area. Strategically located near the central courtyard to benefit from natural light while maintaining privacy.

rooms.name: Wardrobe/Storage
rooms.description: Convenient storage area integrated into the ground floor plan.

openings.details: Large, well-ventilated entrance door with Art Deco glass detailing and security features.
Double-glazed window for enhanced insulation and natural lighting in the living room area.
Small windows integrated into guest bedrooms to provide natural light while preserving privacy.

courtyard.description: Central courtyard designed as a serene space for relaxation. Features a water fountain, seating area, and landscaped garden with local flora.

garden.description: Large garden area adjoining the property with native plants and Art Deco-inspired landscaping. Provides a private outdoor space.
